humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the pathology report, there is metastatic mammary carcinoma in one out of one sentinel lymph node in level I of the left axilla (1/1) with extranodal extension present. Additionally, there is a microscopic focus of metastatic mammary carcinoma in one out of three lymph nodes (1/3) in level I of the left axilla. There are no metastases in the other assessed lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage is N1, as per New Rule 12, which indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic mammary carcinoma in one of one lymph node in level I of the left axilla with extranodal extension >2 mm (pN2a). Additionally, there is a microscopic focus of metastatic mammary carcinoma in one of three lymph nodes in level I of the left axilla (pN1mi). The patient does not have any macrometastasis in levels II and III. Therefore, the N stage is N2.
